vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Ezr.8.33;
son of: Binnui (H1131H)
§ Noadiah = "meeting with Jehovah"
n pr m
1) a Levite, son of Binnui, who weighed the vessels of gold and silver belonging to the temple which were brought back from Babylon
n pr f
2) a prophetess who joined Sanballat and Tobiah in their attempt to intimidate Nehemiah
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Binuy; levita; post exílico; (b)   profetisa; post exílico
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
挪亞底 这个字在希伯來文的意思是 "與耶和華相會"
陽性專有名詞
1) 利未人賓內的兒子, 他是負責清點由巴比倫帶回的屬聖殿的金銀器皿的人之一
(拉 8:33)
陰性專有名詞
2) 和多比雅, 參巴拉一同企圖恐嚇尼希米的一名女先知(尼 6:14)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
挪亚底 这个字在希伯来文的意思是 "与耶和华相会"
阳性专有名词
1) 利未人宾内的儿子, 他是负责清点由巴比伦带回的属圣殿的金银器皿的人之一
(拉 8:33)
阴性专有名词
2) 和多比雅, 参巴拉一同企图恐吓尼希米的一名女先知(尼 6:14)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.6.14
§ Noadiah = "meeting with Jehovah"
n pr m
1) a Levite, son of Binnui, who weighed the vessels of gold and silver belonging to the temple which were brought back from Babylon
n pr f
2) a prophetess who joined Sanballat and Tobiah in their attempt to intimidate Nehemiah
